Texts.Chs: 这相当令人费解，而且即使受到威胁，他们也不会想泄露任何信息。就我个人而言，我认为这些原因已经丢失在历史长河中，除非他们有一个长期的种族记忆，而且在赢得信任的前提下，他们才可能会在某一天泄露出来。
Texts.Eng: It's rather frustrating, as there is nothing further they care to divulge even when threatened. Personally, I think the reasons are lost to history unless Thelusians have a long-term racial memory they might divulge someday, when trust is earned.

Texts.Chs: 尽管艾肯族和蚁族都拒绝透露他们之间的联系，但毫无疑问，这是存在的。蚁族人在没有任何原因的情况下，誓死捍卫艾肯人（甚至是陌生人！）。当受到压力时，艾肯人用他们奇怪的语言暗示了某种类似于“星布雷特伦”的东西。
Texts.Eng: While both the X'i and the Thelusian people refuse to divulge the nature of their 'bond' there is no doubting it is there. Thelusians have been seen to viciously defend X'i (even strangers!) without any real explanation as to why. X'ians, when pressed, have implied in their strange language something akin to 'Star Bretheren'.
